description: The STMT_PRINT table contains information about your statement print and detail bill records.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: GUAR_ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor account that received this statement print or detail bill.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area of this statement print or detail bill.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: The master invoice number for a statement print or detail bill.

columns.name: INV_NUM_ASGN_DT
columns.description: The date on which the invoice number was generated.

columns.name: IS_DEMAND_STMT_YN
columns.description:
Whether this is a demand statement.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: STMT_END_BATCH_DATE
columns.description: End system batch date for the statement. Only transactions posted on or before this date can be included on the statement.

columns.name: STMT_PROC_DATE
columns.description: The date statement data was populated into this print record.

columns.name: BILL_HOME_PHONE
columns.description: Home phone of the guarantor.

columns.name: BILL_WORK_PHONE
columns.description: Work phone of the guarantor.

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_PARTY_NAME
columns.description: Addressee of the statement. This is usually guarantor's name.

columns.name: BILL_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: House number of the guarantor.

columns.name: BILL_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
District of the guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BILL_CITY
columns.description: The city of the guarantor.

columns.name: BILL_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
County of the guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BILL_STATE
columns.description: The state of the guarantor.

columns.name: BILL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Country of the guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BILL_ZIP
columns.description: The zip code of the guarantor.

columns.name: BILL_DELIV_POINT
columns.description: The billing delivery point is a two digit extension to the nine digit US zipcode, with values from 00 to 99. This is typically not seen in human readable format. This can be used when printed as a bar code on a letter to obtain a bulk mail discount.

columns.name: START_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: If specified, professional transactions with service date before this date and hospital accounts with discharge date before this date will be excluded from statement.

columns.name: END_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: If specified, professional transactions with service date after this date and hospital accounts with discharge date after this date will be excluded from statement.

columns.name: BILL_RUN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of this enterprise bill print.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Statement


Hospital Account Detail Bill


Guarantor Detail Bill


Claim Detail Bill

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the linked patient serial number of the patient on the statement. If the guarantor is a patient in the system, this will be the patient for the guarantor. Otherwise if there is only one patient on the statement, it will be that patient. If there are multiple patients on the statement, this item will be blank.

columns.name: IS_MYCHART_NOTIF_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the statement/detail bill notification was sent via MyChart.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_DEMAND_STMT_YN

columns.name: HSP_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The liability bucket record ID that requested this bill print record.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The claim print record ID that requested this bill print record.

columns.name: ROI_ID
columns.description: The release of information record ID that requested this bill print record.

columns.name: ROI_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the release of information record that requested this bill print record.

columns.name: ROI_DOC_KEY
columns.description: The document reference key for the release of information record that requested this bill print record.
